page.title: 10HADLEIGH INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The Industrial Estate has been built over the last twenty years on 11 hectares of land,off Lady Lane. The estate is divided into factory units which produce,make,pack and distribute a wide variety of products. It provides employment for many people in Hadleigh. These are some of the products made in Hadleigh The factory called BASF makes cassette tapes and videos.My brother has bought two of their tapes. H.Erben Ltd.,make items for packing and bottling,plastic holders and crates. Anglian Welding Supplies weld objects like tables;when the workmen weld metal together they use a very hot flame from a torch which melts the metal then joins it together .Skar Plastron make many different products such as hair combs,lunch boxes,ornaments.
